sentences.english: Prof. LIU Lan-lin treated acne from the treatment of Blood Aspect, and explained this by cases.
sentences.chinese: 劉蘭林教授從血分論治痤瘡經驗，並舉案例說明。

sentences.english: The medication has been commonly prescribed to treat serious acne since the 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥自1980來以來被廣泛使用治療重度痤瘡。

sentences.english: Using makeup can cause acne but it can also be easily avoided.
sentences.chinese: 使用化妝品確會導致痤瘡，但是它可以輕易地被避免。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of blood-letting therapy on acne vulgaris.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察針刺放血治療尋常痤瘡的療效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the therapeutic effect of acupuncture and Chinese drugs in the treatment of acne.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察針藥結合療法對痤瘡的治療效果。

sentences.english: It is the sebaceous gland that is the place where acne forms.
sentences.chinese: 這是皮脂腺的地方就是痤瘡形式。

sentences.english: We believe that acne and oily skin are inseparable.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲，痤瘡和油性皮膚是分不開的。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Acupuncture and pharmacotherapy used in combination is effective in the treatment of acne.
sentences.chinese: 結論針藥結合治療痤瘡是一種有效的方法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo evaluate the clinical efficacy of Lingyangjiao pills for Common acne.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價羚羊角滴丸在痤瘡治療中的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between psychosocial factors and female post-adolescent acne.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討心理社會因素與女性青春期後痤瘡的關係。

sentences.english: Your acne meds and other drugs may help fry your skin.
sentences.chinese: 痤瘡膏或其他藥品也許會使皮膚曬黑加劇。

sentences.english: Tea tree essential oil can also be used has a treatment for cold sores, acne, verrucae and warts.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹精油也可有效治療脣皰疹，痤瘡，肉贅和肉疣。

sentences.english: Depending on its severity, acne can cause emotional distress and lead to scarring of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 根據嚴重程度，痤瘡可造成痛苦情緒並導致皮膚瘡疤。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the efficacy of Xin Qing Ning capsules in the treatment of acne vulgaris.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察新清寧膠囊治療尋常型痤瘡的療效。

sentences.english: Tyranny is the secret acne acne preparation.
sentences.chinese: 是祕方配製的專治青春痘痤瘡的。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect mechanism of resolving acne capsule on treating acne vulgaris.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中藥消痤膠囊治療尋常痤瘡的作用機理。

definition: wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
